section.heading: Title conveyable by anyone claiming such.
section.text: Any person claiming title to land may convey his interest in the same, notwithstanding there may be an adverse possession thereof.

annotations.annotation: Severance of joint tenancies: This section and § 42-301 do not supersede the common law rule authorizing the unilateral severance of joint tenancies. Estate of Gulledge, App. D.C., 673 A.2d 1278 (1996).
